languages.text: "А еще... каким-то отчаяньем и безнадегой веет. Будто страдания вязкие как смола весь воздух пропитывают и забиваются тебе в нос и глотку, до тошноты доводят. Я такое только в одном месте чувствовала еще — в логове гемункула того". {n}Идира вздрагивает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "А еще... каким-то отчаяньем и безнадегой веет. Будто страдания вязкие как смола весь воздух пропитывают и забиваются тебе в нос и глотку, до тошноты доводят. Я такое только в одном месте чувствовала еще — в логове гемункула того". {n}Идира вздрагивает, а на коже у нее выступают мурашки.{/n}

languages.text: "And... it gives off a sense of despair. Suffering, thick like tar, hangs in the air, gets into your nose and throat, makes you sick. I've only been to one other place that felt like that — the Haemonculus's lair." {n}Idira flinches.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А еще... каким-то отчаяньем и безнадегой веет. Будто страдания вязкие как смола весь воздух пропитывают и забиваются тебе в нос и глотку, до тошноты доводят. Я такое только в одном месте чувствовала еще — в логове гемункула того". {n}Идира вздрагивает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And... it gives off a sense of despair. Suffering, thick like tar, hangs in the air, gets into your nose and throat, makes you sick. I've only been to one other place that felt like that — the Haemonculus's lair." {n}Idira flinches.{/n}

"And... it gives off a sense of despair. Suffering, thick like tar, hangs in the air, gets into your nose and throat, makes you sick. I've only been to one other place that felt like that — the Haemonculus's lair." {n}Idira flinches.{/n}

"And... it gives off a sense of despair. Suffering, thick like tar, hangs in the air, gets into your nose and throat, makes you sick. I've only been to one other place that felt like that — the Haemonculus's lair." {n}Idira flinches.{/n}

"And... it gives off a sense of despair. Suffering, thick like tar, hangs in the air, gets into your nose and throat, makes you sick. I've only been to one other place that felt like that — the Haemonculus's lair." {n}Idira flinches.{/n}

"And... it gives off a sense of despair. Suffering, thick like tar, hangs in the air, gets into your nose and throat, makes you sick. I've only been to one other place that felt like that — the Haemonculus's lair." {n}Idira flinches.{/n}

languages.text: “还有……那个地方充满了绝望的感觉。痛苦就像柏油一样浓稠，悬浮在空气中，渗入你的鼻子和喉咙，让你难以呼吸。只有一个地方会给我这样的感觉，那就是血伶人的巢穴。”{n}伊迪拉有些畏缩。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And... it gives off a sense of despair. Suffering, thick like tar, hangs in the air, gets into your nose and throat, makes you sick. I've only been to one other place that felt like that — the Haemonculus's lair." {n}Idira flinches.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “还有……那个地方充满了绝望的感觉。痛苦就像柏油一样浓稠，悬浮在空气中，渗入你的鼻子和喉咙，让你难以呼吸。只有一个地方会给我这样的感觉，那就是血伶人的巢穴。”{n}伊迪拉有些畏缩。{/n}

languages.text: «Y... tiene un aura desesperada. El sufrimiento, denso como el alquitrán, impregna el aire, se adhiere a la nariz y a la garganta y provoca náuseas. Solo he estado en un lugar similar: la guarida del Hemónculo». {n}Idira se estremece.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And... it gives off a sense of despair. Suffering, thick like tar, hangs in the air, gets into your nose and throat, makes you sick. I've only been to one other place that felt like that — the Haemonculus's lair." {n}Idira flinches.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y... tiene un aura desesperada. El sufrimiento, denso como el alquitrán, impregna el aire, se adhiere a la nariz y a la garganta y provoca náuseas. Solo he estado en un lugar similar: la guarida del Hemónculo». {n}Idira se estremece.{/n}

languages.text: "Und ... man spürt eine fürchterliche Verzweiflung. Leid hängt in der Luft, dick wie Teer. Es kriecht in die Nase und die Kehle, dass einem übel wird. Ich war bisher nur an einem einzigen anderen Ort, der sich so angefühlt hat — im Versteck des Haemonculus." {n}Idira zuckt zusammen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And... it gives off a sense of despair. Suffering, thick like tar, hangs in the air, gets into your nose and throat, makes you sick. I've only been to one other place that felt like that — the Haemonculus's lair." {n}Idira flinches.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und ... man spürt eine fürchterliche Verzweiflung. Leid hängt in der Luft, dick wie Teer. Es kriecht in die Nase und die Kehle, dass einem übel wird. Ich war bisher nur an einem einzigen anderen Ort, der sich so angefühlt hat — im Versteck des Haemonculus." {n}Idira zuckt zusammen.{/n}

languages.text: 「そして…絶望感を漂わせてる。タールのようにどろりとした苦しみが空気に混じって、それが鼻やのどに入り込むと吐き気を催してくるの。他にそんな気分にさせられた場所と言えば…ハモンキュラスの隠れ家くらいだわ」{n}イディラがたじろぐ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And... it gives off a sense of despair. Suffering, thick like tar, hangs in the air, gets into your nose and throat, makes you sick. I've only been to one other place that felt like that — the Haemonculus's lair." {n}Idira flinches.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そして…絶望感を漂わせてる。タールのようにどろりとした苦しみが空気に混じって、それが鼻やのどに入り込むと吐き気を催してくるの。他にそんな気分にさせられた場所と言えば…ハモンキュラスの隠れ家くらいだわ」{n}イディラがたじろぐ。{/n}

languages.text: « Et... il s'en dégage une impression de désespoir. Une souffrance épaisse comme du goudron flotte dans l'air, s'insinue dans mes narines et ma gorge pour me soulever le cœur. Je n'ai visité qu'un seul autre endroit où j'ai ressenti la même chose... la tanière de l'hémoncule. » {n}Idira tressaille.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And... it gives off a sense of despair. Suffering, thick like tar, hangs in the air, gets into your nose and throat, makes you sick. I've only been to one other place that felt like that — the Haemonculus's lair." {n}Idira flinches.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et... il s'en dégage une impression de désespoir. Une souffrance épaisse comme du goudron flotte dans l'air, s'insinue dans mes narines et ma gorge pour me soulever le cœur. Je n'ai visité qu'un seul autre endroit où j'ai ressenti la même chose... la tanière de l'hémoncule. » {n}Idira tressaille.{/n}

languages.text: "Bir de... İnsanı çaresiz hissettiriyor. Havaya katran gibi ağır bir eziyet hâkim, burnuna ve boğazına girerek insanı hasta ediyor. Daha önce böyle bir yere gitmiştim. Haimonkulus'un yuvası." {n}İdira irkiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And... it gives off a sense of despair. Suffering, thick like tar, hangs in the air, gets into your nose and throat, makes you sick. I've only been to one other place that felt like that — the Haemonculus's lair." {n}Idira flinches.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bir de... Çaresizlik hissi hâkim. Katran gibi ağır eziyet havada dolanıyor, burnuna ve boğazına girerek seni hasta ediyor. Daha önce böyle bir yere gitmiştim. Haimonkulus'un yuvası." {n}İdira irkiliyor.{/n}
